  jquery.flowchart
--================--

URL: https://github.com/sdrdis/jquery.flowchart
Version: 1.2
License: MIT
Modifications: Made some implementations (jquery.flowchart-implementations.diff).
               Implemented fix when using panzoom feature, that affect jQuery-UI drag feature (jquery.flowchart-dragzoom.diff).
               Fixed link render path with zoom (jquery.flowchart-zoomfix.diff).
